channel.title: Learning on Blindfolded Solving
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on Blindfolded Solving

item.title: 3-Style
item.description: Resources: Timothy Goh’s video series on 3-Style and commutators in general Jack Cai’s video series on 3-Style Jack Cai’s 3-Style beginner’s sheet (very good for learning!) One method that tends to work well for learning 3-style as a whole is to first look at a sheet (if you’re just starting out, Jack Cai’s sheet, or a slightly modified version is a great start) and go through each case one by one.
